metadata.title: CVE-2024-25447 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in the imlib_load_image_with_error_return function of imlib2v1.9.1 allows attackers to cause a heap buffer overflow via parsing acrafted image.

criterions.comment: imlib2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
